A typical consequence for a CEO who runs a corporation to the ground? Millions of more dollars in salary and bonuses. https://www.wsj.com/articles/big-companies-pay-ceos-for-good-performanceand-bad-11558085402

Donald Trump, Jeff Bezos and Warren Buffett pay a lower tax rate than someone making $7.25 an hour.

Let that sink in.

In a Sanders administration that ends. We will tax extreme wealth and make the rich pay their fair share. https://twitter.com/DLeonhardt/status/1180990667700477952 QT @DLeonhardt Last year, for the first time on record, the 400 wealthiest Americans paid a lower total tax rate than any other income group.  https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2019/10/06/opinion/income-tax-rate-wealthy.html
